short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block trackers and others element of the internet that vulnerate your privacy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension to avoid being tracked online and protect your personal information while browsing the website. 

- The web tracking detection is performed by means of a Deep Neural Network trained with millions of URLs to distinguish between tracking and safe URL calls. It is the result of a research publication made by the Universitat Polit√®cnica de Catalunya publicly available at "URL-based Web Tracking Detection Using Deep Learning" (https://dl.ifip.org/db/conf/cnsm/cnsm2020/1570659553.pdf).

- Deep Tracking Blocker runs locally in your browser and doesn't store any of your personal data. 

- DTB shows the users in every moment which requests have been blocked and it allows to unblock them one by one if they want in order to facilitate a more personalized experience.

****************************************************************************
Code of this extension can be found on: https://github.com/CBA-UPC/DTB
****************************************************************************
